headline: Bristol girls earn league title; down Fairport
author: Vince Pellegrini
sentences: FAIRPORT HARBOR, Ohio (WKBN) – Bristol won their fourth game in a row to improve to 16-3 following their 59-15 victory over Fairport Harding.
The Lady Panthers clinched their Northeastern Athletic Conference league title with a 12-0 conference mark.
Fairport hadn’t lost in their previous five tries before Wednesday’s setback.
Alexis Shafer tallied seven of her eight points in the first half.
Jaylyn Mullenax added nine points and hauled down 14 rebounds.
Kara McFadden scored a team-high six points for the Skippers.
Belle Zirzow scored 26 points to lead the Panthers.
